about_the_game:
About This Game

Urbex Murder is a horror game centered on exploring abandoned places (Urbex), playable solo or in co-op with up to 4 players and featuring integrated voice chat. It offers several immersive game modes and maps. For example, in co-op mode, players must find a hidden object, but the one who discovers it becomes a secret enemy tasked with preventing the others from escaping. Players need to solve puzzles, identify the enemy, and rescue captured teammates.

Explore Abandoned Places

Experience the best Urbex adventure in this game. Exploring abandoned places is essential to discovering important information on the selected map, allowing you to progress and gain an advantage over other players based on the chosen game mode. Nothing is random; every detail matters. Find the generators to reduce the visibility of others, collect missing parts to drive a vehicle, move objects, or create your own traps to imprison an opponent.

Progress Through the Adventure with Your Friends

In co-op mode, you will have the opportunity to play different game modes available in the game and experience Urbex with friends. Choose the map, the game mode, and invite your friends using the invitation system directly integrated into Urbex Murder. The in-game voice chat will provide a better immersion, allowing you to speak only with nearby players and find a walkie-talkie on the map to give to a player of your choice for distant communication.

Diverse Maps, Unique Scenarios

Multiple maps available do not just mean a visual change. Each map has its own unique story and different mechanics that will be integrated. Each location on the map will affect the difficulty of progression. Depending on the selected map, you will encounter unexpected strangers. Replaying the same map will give you a different experience with random events.

Solve Puzzles and Rescue Your Friends

For a successful Urbex experience, you will have the ability to influence the progress of other players through game mechanics. Prevent your opponents from entering certain areas to waste their time. Set traps, immobilize a player in a location of your choice, and increase the difficulty for their teammates to find them. Barricade all exits, cut the power to more easily detect the location of opponents with their flashlights on. This is just a preview of the available mechanics, and there are many more to discover.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains violence and visible blood, which may be disturbing to some players.

name: Urbex Murder

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 - AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 6GB - AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please note that the game is still in development, and the system requirements are subject to change.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K - AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2070 - AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please note that the game is still in development, and the system requirements are subject to change.

short_description: Urbex Murder is a cooperative horror game where you explore abandoned places alone or with friends. Solve puzzles, confront events, and uncover hidden secrets. Each map offers unique scenarios for an immersive and terrifying experience.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Japanese, Russian, Turkish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal
*languages with full audio support
